display_long_description:
**Glass Grapple began as a college graphics final project — and grew into a full VR game built entirely from scratch.**

The goal was to make a game that feels fast, fluid, and satisfying to move through — a synthwave world full of tight tunnels, shifting walls, with grapple physics that feel real. 

Swing, slingshot, and bend your momentum through **25 levels**, and **5 increasingly challenging Endless modes.**

Adjust the speed of the game and master the movement to swing your way to the top of the leaderboards. 

Glass Grapple features an **original, layered, synthwave soundtrack** that evolves as you progress.

Built from the ground up. Welcome to **Glass Grapple**. 

Press **Trigger** to shoot a grapple

Hold **Trigger** to reel in

Press **Grip Button** to release
[media]

**Pull** the rope to propel yourself
[media]

Activate **slo-mo** for more control
[media]

Adjust the **game speed** to your comfort level
[media]
